w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button group
w:HTMLPanel.p: Group a serie of buttons together on a single line.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Basic usage
Size
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use any of these ButtonGroup.Size to change the size.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup size="LARGE"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup size="DEFAULT"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup size="SMALL"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup size="X_SMALL"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: Each Button can be customize independently (type, iconType or active and disabled properties).

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup size="LARGE"> <w:Button text="Left" iconType="SAVE" type="PRIMARY"/> <w:Button text="middle" type="DANGER" active="true"/> <w:Button text="right" iconType="VIEW" disabled="true"/> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Dropdown use
w:HTMLPanel.p: A ButtonGroup can contains Button and DropdownButton.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="Left" /> <w:Button text="Middle" /> <w:ButtonDropdown label="Middle button"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Middle Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Top"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Middle Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Bottom"/> </w:ButtonDropdown> <w:ButtonDropdown label="Right button"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Top"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Middle"/> <w:NavLink label="Bottom"/> </w:ButtonDropdown> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button toolbar

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup type="TOOLBAR"> <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="1" /> <w:Button text="2" /> <w:Button text="3" /> <w:Button text="4" /> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="5" /> <w:Button text="6" /> <w:Button text="7" /> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="8" /> </w:ButtonGroup> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Vertical variation
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use the ButtonGroup.Type.VERTICALto make the set of Button appears verticaly.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup type="VERTICAL"> <w:Button text="Top" /> <w:Button text="Middle Top" /> <w:Button text="Middle Bottom" /> <w:Button text="Bottom" /> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Justified variation
w:HTMLPanel.p: Set the justified property to true to make the group stretch at his parents width.
